setting.geography: A generation ship orbiting a dying star, divided into 12 habitation rings
setting.technology: Post-scarcity fabrication, AI-assisted navigation, failing FTL drive
setting.society: Meritocratic council of ring-captains, growing tension between rings
setting.era: Year 347 of the voyage, 50 years past the original arrival date

characters.name: Kael Voss
goals: diagnose why the FTL drive keeps failing
fears: being wrong about something that matters
beliefs: everyone on the ship deserves the truth
characters.voice_notes: Speaks precisely. Pauses before important words. Avoids contractions when stressed.

characters.name: Senna Park
goals: keep the food riots from spreading
fears: that the ship will never arrive
beliefs: hope is a resource you ration
a good lie saves more lives than a hard truth
characters.voice_notes: Warm and persuasive in public. Clipped and tired in private. Uses metaphors about weather.

characters.name: Ren
goals: prove the backup navigation logs were tampered with
beliefs: the old generation owes the young an explanation
characters.voice_notes: Fast-talking. Interrupts. Uses ship jargon casually.

characters.name: The Mourner
goals: convince the ship to stop running and accept the dying star as home
beliefs: the voyage was a mistake from the beginning
characters.voice_notes: Speaks slowly, almost a cadence. References old Earth poetry. Never raises voice.
